content.name: Notification Filter
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description:
This mod introduces filtering functionality for some type of Notifications shown in the Ticker window and Logbook.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Set minimum changes of [b]Relation[/b] to be displayed in [b]Notification Ticker[/b] and [b]Logbook[/b] (Separately). [*] Set a minimum amount of [b]Money[/b] transaction to be displayed in [b]Notification Ticker[/b]. [*] Enable/Disable notifications related to [b]Crafting Progress[/b] in the [b]Notification Ticker[/b]. [*] Enable/Disable notifications related to [b]Station Insufficient Funds[/b] in the [b]Notification Ticker[/b] and [b]Logbook[/b]. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b]: Version 8.00HF3 or newer. [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b]: Version 1.95 or higher by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url]. [list] [*] Available on Steam: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Available on Nexus Mods: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Steam Workshop[/b]: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3669797690]Notification Filter[/url] [*] [b]Nexus Mods[/b]: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1985]Notification Filter[/url] [/list] [h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
After installation, please open the [b]Extension Option[/b] menu.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-NotificationFilter/refs/heads/main/docs/images/extension_options.png[/img]
[h2]Notification Filter Menu[/h2]
Then, select the [b]Notification Filter[/b] item to open the filter menu.
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-NotificationFilter/refs/heads/main/docs/images/notification_filter.png[/img]
[h2]Relation Minimum Changes[/h2]
There are two different [b]Dropdowns[/b] to define the minimum change of [b]Relation[/b] to be displayed in [b]Notification ticker[/b] or recorder into [b]Logbook[/b]: [list] [*] [b]0 - pass all changes[/b]: Equal to the [b]vanilla[/b] game. [*] [b]1 point or more[/b]: Only changes of [b]Relation[/b] equal or higher than 1 point will be visible. [*] [b]2 points or more[/b]: Only changes of [b]Relation[/b] equal or higher than 2 points will be visible. [*] [b]5 points or more[/b]: Only changes of [b]Relation[/b] equal or higher than 5 points will be visible. [*] [b]10 points or more[/b]: Only changes of [b]Relation[/b] equal or higher than 10 points will be visible. [/list] [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-NotificationFilter/refs/heads/main/docs/images/notification_filter_relation_dropdown.png[/img]
[h2]Money Minimum Changes[/h2]
There is a [b]Slider[/b] to define the minimum amount of [b]Money[/b] transaction to be displayed in [b]Notification ticker[/b].
Acceptable values are between [b]0[/b] and [b]100,000,000[/b] credits with [b]1000[/b] credits step. Zero value means that all transactions will be visible as in the [b]vanilla[/b] game.
[h2]Crafting Progress[/h2]
There is a [b]Checkbox[/b] to disable notifications related to [b]Crafting Progress[/b] in the [b]Notification ticker[/b] and [b]Logbook[/b].
There is an example of such notification in the image below: [img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chemodun/X4-NotificationFilter/refs/heads/main/docs/images/crafting_progress.png[/img]
[h2]Station Insufficient Funds[/h2]
There are two [b]Checkboxes[/b] to disable notifications related to [b]Station Insufficient Funds[/b] in the [b]Notification ticker[/b] and [b]Logbook[/b].
[h2]Other[/h2]
There is also a [b]Debug[/b] checkbox to enable debug messages for the notifications that are being processed by the filter.
